name: Bunbun and the search for the watermelons!
name_original: Bunbun and the search for the watermelons!
description:
Find both pieces of Bunbun's lost watermelon! Hold shift to sprint.

Game by Jacob O. Hansen

Assets used:

Mushroom Land by Manufactura K4

Fantasy landscape by Pxltiger

Fantasy Skybox FREE by Render Knight

Polygonal Foliage Asset Package by Aligned Games

Low Poly Fruit Pickups by Rem Storms

Low Poly Tree Pack by Broken Vector

Low Poly Cliff Pack by Broken Vector

Low Poly Rock Pack by Broken Vector

Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack by JustCreate

LowPoly Rocks by SnowFiend Studios

fBasic Assets by FImpossible Creations
